p: Over most regions, the number of heatwaves per season (Fig. 1b) is projected to increase by approximately 1.5–2 events per degree of global warming. The exception is over central and southern Africa and central Asia, where a median increase of 2.5 events per season is projected. However, caution is recommended in interpreting changes in heatwave events per °C over some regions, as discussed further in Section 3.2.
